name: The Dead Lasts
description:
This is quickly slapped project made in 3 hours for the Trijam 124. WARNING : FOR GAME JAM SAKE DON'T LET THE PLAYER ROTATE OR YOUR'E DONE FOR!

Controls :
Alive Player : A-D Arrow Keys to move. Space bar to jump.

Ghost: Getting killed turns you to ghost which lasts for the entire level.
Arrow keys to control. Uses a snake-like movement system.

The game has a certain unintentional bug that needs to be used to beat a certain level. Find it and beat that level. (optional).

Finding the glitch is hard so glitch reveal! The glitch is that you can stick to walls by pressing the keys and keep pressing space to infinitely jump. 
Explanation : My ground check radius is big which extends outside the player.
